Suitable for Adults, the elderly and children. Age restriction You must be at least 16 years old to purchase this product. How to use Please read the enclosed leaflet for full instructions. Check that the tube seal is not broken first use. If it is, do not use the cream. Wash hands before and after use. For adults, the elderly and children: Apply gently to bruised areas four times a day, as needed. Do not use more cream than the label/leaflet tells you to. For use on the skin only. Keep away from eyes, mouth and nose. Do not apply to broken or irritated skin. Stop using this product if skin becomes red, dry or irritated. If you need more advice ask your pharmacist. Hazards and Cautions If symptoms worsen or persist after using the product for 7 days, talk to your doctor or a qualified healthcare practitioner. Do not use: - If you are allergic to any of the ingredients or to plants of the Asteraceae (Compositae) family (such as daisies, marigolds or artichokes). - If you are pregnant or breastfeeding. Use by the date on the end flap of the carton and the tube edge. Keep all medicines out of the sight and reach of children. Storage Do not store above 25°C. Store in original container. Precautions This is a medicine; - Consult your doctor or pharmacist if you have an underlying medical condition, are taking any other medication or complementary therapy, or if symptoms persist. - Seek advice before using if you are breast feeding, pregnant, planning to become pregnant, or suffer from allergies.
